GSD.description:
KVM: LAPIC: Also cancel preemption timer during SET_LAPIC

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.5 by commit ce55f63f6cea4cab8ae9212f73285648a5baa30d. For more details please see the references link.
